text: kavurun visvasaya taba dæhæmi kriyavan karannoda, ovunva niyata vasayenma allah diya dahara sada galamin æti svargayanhi ætulu karanneya. kavurun pratiksepa karannoda, ovun satun kannak men kaminda, (satun men) suvaya vindiminda sitinnaha. (ehet) ovun (avasana vasayen) ræendana sthanaya nirayayi
